text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Now, Tamtam, what are you doing<n>here? Is there something
you needed<n>in the right-side room?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Oh, y'know, I was just worried how<n>you three were gettin'
on.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
...That's all? Are you suuure you<n>weren't sneaking over to
facilitate a<n>conversation between Rice and<n>Bourbon?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh?! I mean yeah, but how'd ya...

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I knew it. You're such a<n>sweetheart, Tamtam.
Whenever<n>someone needs help, you leap right<n>into action.
But...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Ya wouldn't make a preschooler tally<n>up the family's
monthly budget, would<n>ya? Just let Bourbon focus on her<n>
strengths.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Ah, don't sweat it! I'll fix it up later,<n>so leave it there for me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: ...Have you tried waiting for them?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Waiting?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
For them to figure things out<n>themselves. I'm not telling you
to stop<n>helping, but you shouldn't do<n>everything for them.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Just give them a little hint... and then<n>wait. They might not
get it on the first<n>try, but that's part of learning.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
You have to believe in them—that's<n>what caretaking is all
about.

text_block_list.name: Rob Roy & Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Sorry, Tamamo. Can I come after all?<n>Creek, we solved the
mystery. Can<n>you please gather everyone?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: ...Because they can do it if theytry.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Whew, we managed to make it out.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Um, Rice? Did you and Bourbon...<n>g-get a chance to talk?
While you<n>were in... the other room...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Huh? I guess we spoke a little. Kind<n>of. We honestly just,
um...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Rattle.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Aaah!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Your reactions are very pronounced.<n>This is good
reference material for<n>tricks that will scare guests.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Oh... I-is it really?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
In the end, Bourbon worked out the<n>riddle herself. I was too
scared to do<n>much.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But that's okay. All I ever do is get in<n>the way, so I'm really
happy she<n>called me a good reference.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And that's all thanks to you inviting<n>us to visit the park with
you. Hehe...<n>Thank you. I really appreciate<n>everything
you've done, Rob Roy.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: That's a relief... I'm just glad I could<n>be of help!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? Rob Roy?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
To be honest... I was so worried that<n>I'd dragged you both
here and<n>marched you around the park without<n>
considering your feelings.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...I, I had no idea. If anything, you<n>seemed extra confident
today.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: You can thank Sweep for that. She<n>lent me a wand.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
It lets me speak my mind like Sweep<n>does. Almost like... the
magic has<n>transformed me into a real witch.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Transformed you?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Halloween is a day to dress up and<n>dare to be someone
else. You can<n>borrow the costume's power to say<n>things
you can't say yourself.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Does that mean... deep down, you<n>were nervous too? And
all this time,<n>you've been hiding it?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... I was, but you seemed so<n>down. I had to do
something, even if it<n>was forward of me.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Rice, Rob Roy. We're heading to the<n>next area.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: We'll be right there! And, Rice, um... I<n>also wanted to say...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
You keep saying you're in the way,<n>but to me, your
presence is always<n>warm and supporting. I've been<n>
really wanting... to tell you that.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Rob Roy...
